lead_paragraph: The E.P.A. ordered Bayer CropScience and Nichino America to take a widely used insecticide off the market because it harmed tiny aquatic animals

headline.print_headline: E.P.A. Says Insecticide Harms Aquatic Animals
headline.main: E.P.A. Says Insecticide Harms Tiny Aquatic Animals

snippet: The E.P.A. ordered Bayer CropScience and Nichino America to take a widely used insecticide off the market because it harmed tiny aquatic animals
abstract: Environmental Protection Agency orders Bayer CropScience and Nichino America, makers of widely used insecticide flubendiamide, to take chemical off market because it harms tiny aquatic animals.
